subtitles.transcript: If I were to label one thing as the UC affordability crisis
it would be that no one seems to recognize
and the actual problem is that it’s the low-income students
who are disproportionately bearing the burden of debt.
In fact all the rhetoric that’s out there
middle-income families are being turned away.”
And I think we have to recognize that our state Cal Grant,
the institutional grant program are doing a lot,
